projectGridLines.title: Title: Financial Planning & Analysis – Internship with IB CFO team for Cost /Revenue or FRM
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Financial Planning & Analysis – Internship with IB CFO team for Cost /Revenue or FRM

Description: Deep dive, Analyse and Report/Prepare financials for the investment banking division. To identify opportunities and risks. Provide commentaries and executive summaries.

Specific courses required for project execution: Would prefer M.Sc. (Hons.) Economics, M.Sc. (Hons.) Mathematics, B.E. (Hons.) Computer Science. Alternately, Chem/Mech/Civil with finance minor is also fine.
